column4: I keep getting Could not install '/var/cache/apt/archives/cupsys_1.2.4-2ubuntu3.1_i386.deb' when i try to update from 6.06 to 6.10. can anyone help?
download it manuaally and try it
you mean the update?
yup
I have issues with the mouse for live cds. and i'm generally too lazy to try and download another cd and burn it.
a sec
apperently my software index for Apt-get is broken...
get the update from here http://security.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/main/c/cupsys/
i've got broken dependencies. until i fix those i'm not going anywhere
okay :)
yeah. It kinda decided that while it was gonna stop the upgrade it was gonna take my computer with it.
that is one reason I never upgrade clean install ftw
i would if i could.
whay cant u? no cd drive?
it rejects anything above 6.06 for install. it freezes up.
network install?
and yeah. it doesn't have a cd drive either.
u try with alternate cd?
when i tried to download it it gave me the same exact cd. I don't have any more CD-R's
I think alternate cd is text based installer
that's what i thought too.
take a look at the names again when u download I am pretty sure its not sam
Probably not.
